input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Coordinator

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job descriptionThe Digital Marketing Coordinator will coordinate and execute all digital and CRM strategies at Root3. The Digital Marketing Coordinator will work closely with the Digital and Account Team to execute and report on the strategic objectives of each client. 
Areas of Responsibility and Mastery: 
CRM Works closely with the digital team to develop and implement email marketing campaigns including, but not limited to, email cadences, email automation, and workflowsBuilds and implements custom fields and custom reports for clientsIdentifies and builds appropriate target audiences based on historical customer data via Google, LinkedIn, and more, and through third-party sources such as Definitive Healthcare and ZoomInfo Updates and maintains the CRM
WordPressBuilds landing pages for the accounts and digital team Adds forms and connects them to the CRM Reports on success of the website via Google Analytics 
Digital Implements digital strategies across all platforms (paid search, paid social affiliate, email, and more)Reports on digital campaigns using Google Analytics and other data sourcesResearches the latest digital tools and interactive trends SkillsStrong written and verbal communication skillsPrior experience with a CRM such as HubSpot/Salesforce preferredPrior experience with WordPressPrior experience with Google Analytics preferredPrior experience with Excel preferred

How We Live Our Values at ROOT3 Marketing & Business Development 
We believe in goal setting and mentorship. You’ll be partnered with someone at ROOT3 to help you achieve your personal and professional goals and ensure our values help you become the best version of yourself.
EMPOWER | We celebrate everyone’s true self and have an intentional plan to activate and amplify every voice. 
FORWARD | We generate powerful forward momentum for ourselves and our clients by exploring new things, staying curious, and always looking to learn more together. We lean into opportunities and continuously improve our processes, our teams, and ourselves. 
OUTCOMES | We don’t see problems; we see challenges. And we accept challenges as opportunities to be creative, learn new skills, and deliver solutions that add value for our clients.
Additional InformationROOT3 offers a wide range of benefits, including:Medical, dental, and vision insurance (ROOT3 pays $250/mo toward coverage)PTO & WFH Outpatient mental health coverage (in network) at no charge401(k) program with up to 3% employer match after one-year of employmentSubsidized gym membership at Chicago Athletic ClubsPaid parental leavePet insurance
This is an on-site position at our office in Bucktown. We are a five-minute walk from the Damen Blue Line stop.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Marketing Coordinator
output_json.summary: Job description for a Marketing Coordinator at Root3, responsible for coordinating and executing digital and CRM strategies.
soft_skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills
job_responsibilities: Works closely with the digital team to develop and implement email marketing campaigns
Builds and implements custom fields and custom reports for clients
Identifies and builds appropriate target audiences based on historical customer data
Builds landing pages for the accounts and digital team
Adds forms and connects them to the CRM
Reports on the success of the website via Google Analytics
Implements digital strategies across all platforms
Reports on digital campaigns using Google Analytics and other data sources
Researches the latest digital tools and interactive trends
output_json.company_information: ROOT3 offers a wide range of benefits including medical, dental, and vision insurance, PTO & WFH, outpatient mental health coverage, 401(k) program with employer match, subsidized gym membership, and paid parental leave.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We believe in goal setting and mentorship. You’ll be partnered with someone at ROOT3 to help you achieve your personal and professional goals and ensure our values help you become the best version of yourself.

other.content: This is an on-site position at our office in Bucktown. We are a five-minute walk from the Damen Blue Line stop.
